data.title: Sponsors
data.meta_description: Oracle Utilities Users Group Conference OUUG
data.text:
We’re celebrating our 15th year anniversary! As a valued member of the Utility services and solutions industry, you are invited to participate as a sponsor and exhibitor at the upcoming in-person 2024 Oracle Utilities User Group (www.OUUG.org) community-sponsored conference, which will be held at the luxury four-star JW Marriott, Austin Texas. This thriving annual user-directed, self-funded event will feature sessions for Customer Operations, Asset Management & Field Services, Meter Data Management, Network Management System, Load Analysis/Lodestar & Cloud/Technology & Analytics.

Given that the user conference meetings are not funded nor organized by Oracle (we appreciate the support from the customer community leaders & partners!), your support and sponsorship are what make these quality events possible. Thank you in advance for your consideration & support!

Take part in the most visible and engaging aspects of this grassroots event through sponsorship of the conference program, Tuesday night Vendor Welcome Reception & Expo, Wednesday night Offsite Social, industry media access, promotional giveaway items, Web presence, social media, lunches & breaks, as well as session presentations (co-presented with an Oracle customer; required). Sponsor opportunities are available on a first-come, first-serve basis, though past sponsors will be given priority.

To confirm a 2024 Sponsorship, simply contact info@OUUG.org to get the process started. We can send you an online invoice for payment by card, ACH, wire or check. (Checks made payable to Oracle Utilities Users Group, 1155 Arnold Drive, C365, Martinez California, 9445 USA)

2024 OUUG SPONSORSHIP PROSPECTUS DOWNLOAD

2024 OUUG VENDOR INFO PACKET DOWNLOAD

2024 OUUG VENDOR NIGHT CHECKLIST & MAP

DOWNLOAD OUUG 2024 LOGO LIBRARY

VENDOR NIGHT EXHIBITOR SCHEDULE

Tuesday, March 26, 2024 / JW Marriott Grand Ballroom

12:00pm – 4:00pm Vendor Night Set-up & Sponsor Registration

5:00pm – 7:30pm OUUG Registration for All Attendees

5:00pm – 8:00pm Vendor Night Welcome Reception & Expo

8:00pm – 10:00pm Vendor Night Teardown (must vacate ballroom that evening)

VENDOR SHIPPING INFORMATION

If you are shipping marketing materials/supplies and your booth to the hotel, address incoming items as outlined below. Ship to the hotel to arrive no earlier than Wednesday, March 20, 2024 and no later than Friday, March 22, 2024.

ALL INBOUND AND OUTBOUND OUUG SHIPMENTS ARE HANDLED BY THE JW MARRIOTT’S FEDEX OFFICE; please view complete shipping guidance HERE.

BROCHURE/PROMO ITEM FOR ATTENDEE PACKET SHIPPING ADDRESS:

Cathy Fuss 209-564-6744

c/o FedEx Office at JW Marriott Austin

110 E 2nd Street

Austin TX 78701

HOLD FOR: OUUG 2024

Box ___ of ___

BOOTH/SUPPLIES SHIPPING ADDRESS:

YOUR NAME / YOUR COMPANY/YOUR CELL

c/o FedEx Office at JW Marriott Austin

110 E 2nd Street

Austin TX 78701

HOLD FOR: OUUG 2024

Box ___ of ___

Paymentus is a leading provider of cloud-based bill payment technology and solutions. We deliver our next-generation product suite through a modern technology stack to more than 1,300 billers across North America. Our omni-channel platform provides consumers with easy-to-use, flexible and secure electronic bill payment experiences through their preferred payment channel and type.

Paymentus’ proprietary Instant Payment Network™, or IPN, extends our reach by connecting our IPN partners’ platforms and tens of thousands of billers to our integrated billing, payment, and reconciliation capabilities. Paymentus serves billers of all sizes across a variety of industry verticals, including utilities, financial services, insurance, government, telecommunications and healthcare. For more information, please visit www.paymentus.com.

Red Clay Consulting leads utilities in digital transformation. Over the last twenty years, Red Clay has helped more than 300 utilities throughout the world evolve by improving operations and customer experiences. Our consultants provide expert guidance from a project’s conception to its post-production support. We focus on the industry’s leading software Oracle Utilities and are a Gold Level Member of the Oracle Partner Network. Red Clay takes great pride in our stellar reputation throughout the industry – a reputation built on training, experience, teamwork, and commitment to the client.

Red Clay is a dynamic company of engaged individuals eager to grow and contribute. Our employee-centric and award-winning culture focuses on collaboration and community and provides ongoing opportunities for development and career growth. Our core values are – Achieve excellence together. Embrace and drive change. Exceed expectations. Invest in relationships. And, enjoy the journey – inform every aspect of how we operate.

Visit www.redclay.com to learn more about our mission of doing what’s right and fair for our clients, our employees, and our company.

Founded exclusively to serve the rapidly transforming Energy and Utility industry, each year SurePower provides dozens of utility clients with consulting and advisory support across the entire suite of Oracle’s utility products. Over the past decade and across more than 120 utilities, Sure Power’s experts have forged an industry-wide reputation for integrity, capability, discipline, and consistent execution. Incorporating lessons learned from our support of more than three-dozen Oracle CIS implementations, Sure Power’s industry leading CCB/C2M/CCS ‘To-Do’ stabilization processing experts have resolved more than seven million billing exceptions for our clients and enabled sustainable enhancements to their organizational capability, operational efficiencies, and service levels. Please visit us in person while at the 2024 OUUG or online at www.surepowerconsulting.com.

CIS Quality Assurance Inc. provides Utility clients and SI partners with expert product testing support for the Oracle Energy and Water software application suite, including CC&B, C2M, CCS, CX, DSS, MWM, OFS, MDM, MSCS, WAM & SOA applications. We specialize in Functional and Integration testing for on premise and cloud installations.

We can Drive and Deliver your project’s entire test effort from Test Planning all the way through Test Execution. In addition, we provide à la carte testing services, managed services support and/or testing resource staff augmentation that aligns with your specific testing needs and budget.

We offer a full array of software testing services and staffing solutions for Implementations, Upgrades & Maintenance Projects. For more information on how we can help you mitigate risk and deliver an effective testing Return on Investment (ROI) on time and within budget for your project contact us for a free consultation at www.cisqualityassurance.com

CriticalRiver Inc. is a technology solutions & consulting company whose mission is to help clients create & execute digital transformations. With over 1,000 employees/associates and a global delivery network to support projects of any size in any location, we bring hands-on expertise, solutions, & talent to help solve complex business & technology challenges — when you need it, where you need it.

In Utilities, we are synonymous with TALENT. By design, we are built for Oracle Energy & Water implementation & support programs. Our “Talent on Demand” services help partners and clients solve their resource challenges with flexible, scalable, and cost-effective solutions. With a combined team of more than 150+ Oracle Utilities professionals and growing, CriticalRiver stands ready to help any Utility achieve its Oracle Energy & Water transformation, upgrade, or managed services support requirements.

We are a Gold Member of the Oracle Partner network, as well as a certified technology partner to Salesforce, MuleSoft, Microsoft Azure, NetSuite, AWS, Workato, LogiSense, Workato, Dell Bhoomi, Snowflake, and Avolin.

To learn more about our Power & Utility services, contact Scott.Birdsong@CriticalRiver.com.

KUBRA offers the most comprehensive customer experience management solutions available to the utility industry today, including 7 of the top 10 gas and electric utilities in the U.S. Our extensive portfolio includes billing and payments, mapping, mobile apps, proactive communications, and artificial intelligence solutions for clients and their customers. With more than 1.5 billion customer interactions annually, KUBRA services reach over 40% of households in the U.S. and Canada.

It provides solutions to some of the largest utilities in North America.

When you break it all down, KUBRA:

Supports over 365 clients across North America

Posts over 225 million online payments

Delivers 500 million mail pieces

Sends 250 million alert messages

Receives 160 million utility map views

Enables 35 million mobile app interactions annually

Mycelium Software is the leading provider of automated testing solutions for Oracle Utilities. Mycelium has helped numerous, medium-to-large-scale utilities achieve operational excellence by reducing overall cost-of-ownership through automated testing, data conversions, copy data management (data subsetting), and DevOps. Our end-to-end solutions are used by system integrators to streamline project implementations. In addition, our utility clients utilize our solutions to efficiently manage their day-to-day operations and improve the overall quality of their processes.

Automate your entire enterprise of mission-critical CRM/ERP assets with Mycelium Software. Our suite of products includes Data Purge & Archive, Data Conversion & Transformations, Automated Testing, and Automated CI/CD Pipelines for DevOps. This feature-rich suite effectively achieves operational objectives and promotes digital transformation. Visit us at www.myceli.com

USP is a professional and technical services company built by utility experts, imparting knowledge for our customers to get the most out of their software investment that guarantees them to succeed. We don’t believe our role stops with just installing software. We want every one of our clients to feel confident in their investment with USP. As a system integrator that solely focuses on providing implementation, integration, and support services for the Oracle Energy & Water Product Suite, our goal is to give our clients the ability to leverage our expertise and eliminate knowledge gaps in their internal teams while ensuring they are up to date with the latest technology. We Install Confidence. Not Just Software.

Abjayon, established by former Oracle Utilities executives, stands out in the industry with its profound expertise in the complete Oracle E&W product suite. Our leadership and core engineering team, originally from Oracle Utilities, bring extensive experience in developing, implementing, and supporting this suite, distinguishing us from competitors of all sizes. Our specialization in efficiently implementing solutions like CCS, WACS, OFSC, NMS/OMS, and ADMS is unparalleled.

Our portfolio highlights our capabilities:

*CCS/C2M*: Numerous successful deliveries and upgrades from older to the latest CC&B versions.

*MDM*: Leading in Oracle MDM implementations, with a total of 27M smart meters globally.

*WACS/WAM*: Ongoing projects in these areas.

*Managed Services*: Comprehensive support for utilities using C2M, MDM, WACS, among others.

With over 350 professionals, Abjayon is headquartered in California and operates global delivery centers in Raleigh, Canada, India, and the Philippines. Our model ensures onsite project management and architecture leadership, combined with cost-effective development and QA from our offshore offices.

BOSS is the preeminent Oracle Energy and Water implementer and managed service provider solely dedicated to Oracle applications and technologies. We built our business atop world-class talent made of 100% BOSS resources and pride ourselves for the in-house talent that we have grown over the past decade. BOSS services are contracted and subcontracted by investor-owned, publicly owned, co-operative, and local government utilities. Three of the Top-Five Global Consulting Firms trust BOSS resources to deploy Oracle solutions for their customers. Our commitment is to delight the customer with transformation velocity to modernize their business systems while streamlining business processes and minimizing change management.

BOSS completed Oracle’s first CCB to C2M conversion, hosted within Oracle’s Cloud Infrastructure (OCI) and is in the process of converting another C2M hosted deployment to Customer Cloud Service (CCS). Ask how our conversion tools allow customers to upgrade, migrate, or convert from on-premises to cloud, or seated licenses to software as a service models. Our method completes your modernization from kickoff to Production in less than (10) ten months. We offer a no-cost business/system assessment of your organization to give utilities a modernization roadmap to the future. Find more information by visiting BOSSusa.com.

Customer experience, commerce and payments have changed

forever. With innovative new technologies like 5G and AI reshaping

consumer expectations, it’s up to brands in every industry in the world

to deliver digitally-enabled, engaging experiences that wow their

customers, no matter where they are in their customer journey.

That’s where CSG comes in. CSG is a purpose-driven, high-growth SaaS

platform company helping some of the world’s most recognizable

brands solve their toughest business challenges and make more

money. We’re a trusted partner to global companies that want to

evolve to meet the demands of today’s digital economy, with futureready solutions that drive exceptional customer experiences.

In Consulting, we are building a better working world by transforming businesses through the power of people, technology and innovation.

It’s our ambition to become the world’s leading transformation consultants.

The diversity and skills of 70,000+ people will help clients realize transformation by putting humans at the center, delivering technology at speed and leveraging innovation at scale.

These core drivers of “Transformation Realized” will create long-term value for people, clients and society.

For more information about our Consulting organization, please visit ey.com/consulting.

Whether your project is just getting started, ready to grow, or needs help getting back on track, our team can help you achieve your goals.

At IntelliTect, our skilled software engineers are passionate about solving hard problems with modern software solutions. Our process of listening first and creating an environment of dialog and transparency helps us to thoroughly understand your business and come alongside you as a trusted partner.

iPaySmart is the industry’s trusted and proven AI-Powered Vertical Specific Digital Customer Experience Payment Platform. Our integrated platform is designed to facilitate seamless, secure payments, while also automating billing processes and offering a range of payment options. The comprehensive platform is augmented by advanced analytics, driving improved revenue streams and enhancing overall customer satisfaction. With advanced AI technology, we’re strategically focused on industries such as Energy & Utilities, Municipalities, Telecom, eMobility, Energy Trading & Exchange, and Distributed Energy Resources (DER).

Our integrated platform streamlines the entire payment collection and validation process, offering automation, configurability, and scalability for an optimized billing and payment CX experience. We take pride in setting a new industry standard for payment solutions, benefiting businesses of all sizes. Additionally, our commitment to compliance is unwavering, as we hold Level 1 PCI-DSS, NACHA, ADA, GDPR, and CCPA certifications. This ensures that customers can trust in the safety and security of their payment experiences with iPaySmart.

Woman-owned Triniti Consulting provides business-driven technology solutions to address the needs and challenges of the modern digital utility. Triniti is composed of thought-leaders who not only understand how the industry is developing today but where it is going in the future. This allows Triniti to guide utilities in the best solutions to meet the most complex business requirements of today, while building scalable and adaptable solutions for the future. Triniti has extensive knowledge and experience implementing key industry processes supported by Oracle Energy and Water / Oracle Utilities Customer Technology on-premises and cloud solutions, including but not limited to streamlining meter-to-cash processes and promoting customer engagement initiatives. Triniti also offers client-side services, including vendor oversight, IT roadmap strategy, vendor selection, etc. Leveraging industry best practices, breadth of experience integrating with third-party applications and in-depth knowledge of the Oracle Energy and Water products, Triniti can help utilities of all sizes exceed short- and long-term strategic objectives.
